snippet.title: OGORA - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Ogora is a fantasy roguelike deck-builder where you will craft powerful decks, cast unwieldy spells, and blow up your own path through a procedurally generated dungeon. Adorn yourself with hidden trinkets and try your best to survive!

Play the prologue now on Itch!
https://oolcayhitsay.itch.io/ogora

Wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3262090/OGORA/

Join us on Discord!
https://discord.gg/NHdzQNVE7M
